review: I absolutely love the PopCap Ultimate Collection! The variety of games, including Bejeweled 3, Plants vs. Zombies, and Zuma's Revenge, is fantastic and provides hours of entertainment. The games are well-made, easy to install, and run smoothly on my Windows 7 computer. The value for money is exceptional, considering the number and quality of the games included. This collection is a must-have for anyone who enjoys casual gaming, and it's suitable for all ages. Highly recommended!
